## ðŸ› ï¸ Ð”Ð¾ÐºÑƒÐ¼ÐµÐ½Ñ‚Ð°Ñ†Ð¸Ñ API Ð±Ð°Ð·Ñ‹ Ð´Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ‹Ñ… Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´ÑƒÐºÑ‚Ð¾Ð² Chomp MCP Ð¡ÐµÑ€Ð²ÐµÑ€ âœ… 4 Ð¾Ð¿ÐµÑ€Ð°Ñ†Ð¸Ð¸

### ÐžÐ¿Ð¸ÑÐ°Ð½Ð¸Ðµ
Ð­Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ‚ API Ñ‚Ñ€ÐµÐ±ÑƒÐµÑ‚ ÐºÐ»ÑŽÑ‡ API, ÐºÐ¾Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ð¹ Ð²Ñ‹ Ð¼Ð¾Ð¶ÐµÑ‚Ðµ Ð¿Ð¾Ð»ÑƒÑ‡Ð¸Ñ‚ÑŒ, Ð¿Ð¾Ð´Ð¿Ð¸ÑÐ°Ð²ÑˆÐ¸ÑÑŒ Ð½Ð° [https://chompthis.com/api](https://chompthis.com/api/). ÐŸÐ¾ÑÐ»Ðµ Ð¿Ð¾Ð»ÑƒÑ‡ÐµÐ½Ð¸Ñ Ð²Ð°ÑˆÐµÐ³Ð¾ ÐºÐ»ÑŽÑ‡Ð° Ð°Ð²Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ€Ð¸Ð·ÑƒÐ¹Ñ‚Ðµ ÐµÐ³Ð¾ Ð² Ð¸Ð½Ñ‚ÐµÑ€Ñ„ÐµÐ¹ÑÐµ Ð¸ Ð¸ÑÐ¿Ð¾Ð»ÑŒÐ·ÑƒÐ¹Ñ‚Ðµ ÐºÐ¾Ð½ÐµÑ‡Ð½Ñ‹Ðµ Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ‡ÐºÐ¸, Ð¿Ñ€ÐµÐ´Ð¾ÑÑ‚Ð°Ð²Ð»ÑÑ Ð½ÐµÐ¾Ð±Ñ…Ð¾Ð´Ð¸Ð¼Ñ‹Ðµ Ð¿Ð°Ñ€Ð°Ð¼ÐµÑ‚Ñ€Ñ‹. ÐŸÑ€Ð¸Ð¼ÐµÑ€Ñ‹ Ð¸ ÑƒÐ¿Ñ€Ð°Ð²Ð»ÐµÐ½Ð¸Ðµ ÐºÐ»ÑŽÑ‡Ð°Ð¼Ð¸ API Ð´Ð¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒÐ¿Ð½Ñ‹ Ð¿Ð¾ Ð¿Ñ€ÐµÐ´Ð¾ÑÑ‚Ð°Ð²Ð»ÐµÐ½Ð½Ñ‹Ð¼ ÑÑÑ‹Ð»ÐºÐ°Ð¼.

### ðŸ”§ ÐšÐ°Ðº ÑÑ‚Ð¾ Ñ€Ð°Ð±Ð¾Ñ‚Ð°ÐµÑ‚

Ð­Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ‚ Ñ€Ð°Ð±Ð¾Ñ‡Ð¸Ð¹ Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ñ†ÐµÑÑ Ð¿Ñ€ÐµÐ¾Ð±Ñ€Ð°Ð·ÑƒÐµÑ‚ Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑƒÐ¼ÐµÐ½Ñ‚Ð°Ñ†Ð¸ÑŽ API Ð±Ð°Ð·Ñ‹ Ð´Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ‹Ñ… Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´ÑƒÐºÑ‚Ð¾Ð² Chomp Ð² Ð¸Ð½Ñ‚ÐµÑ€Ñ„ÐµÐ¹Ñ, ÑÐ¾Ð²Ð¼ÐµÑÑ‚Ð¸Ð¼Ñ‹Ð¹ Ñ MCP, Ð´Ð»Ñ AI-Ð°Ð³ÐµÐ½Ñ‚Ð¾Ð².

â€¢ **MCP Ð¢Ñ€Ð¸Ð³Ð³ÐµÑ€**: Ð¡Ð»ÑƒÐ¶Ð¸Ñ‚ ÐºÐ¾Ð½ÐµÑ‡Ð½Ð¾Ð¹ Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ‡ÐºÐ¾Ð¹ Ð²Ð°ÑˆÐµÐ³Ð¾ ÑÐµÑ€Ð²ÐµÑ€Ð° Ð´Ð»Ñ Ð·Ð°Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾ÑÐ¾Ð² AI-Ð°Ð³ÐµÐ½Ñ‚Ð¾Ð²

â€¢ **ÐÐ°Ñ‚Ð¸Ð²Ð½Ð°Ñ Ð˜Ð½Ñ‚ÐµÐ³Ñ€Ð°Ñ†Ð¸Ñ**: Ð’Ð¾Ð·Ð²Ñ€Ð°Ñ‰Ð°ÐµÑ‚ Ð¾Ñ‚Ð²ÐµÑ‚Ñ‹ Ð½Ð°Ð¿Ñ€ÑÐ¼ÑƒÑŽ AI-Ð°Ð³ÐµÐ½Ñ‚Ñƒ  


### ðŸ“‹ Ð”Ð¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒÐ¿Ð½Ñ‹Ðµ Ð¾Ð¿ÐµÑ€Ð°Ñ†Ð¸Ð¸ (4 ÐºÐ¾Ð½ÐµÑ‡Ð½Ñ‹Ðµ Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ‡ÐºÐ¸)

ÐŸÐ¾Ð»ÑƒÑ‡Ð¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð±Ñ€ÐµÐ½Ð´Ð¸Ñ€Ð¾Ð²Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ‹Ð¹ Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´ÑƒÐºÑ‚ Ð¿Ð¾ ÑˆÑ‚Ñ€Ð¸Ñ…-ÐºÐ¾Ð´Ñƒ, ÐŸÐ¾Ð»ÑƒÑ‡Ð¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð±Ñ€ÐµÐ½Ð´Ð¸Ñ€Ð¾Ð²Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ‹Ð¹ Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´ÑƒÐºÑ‚ Ð¿Ð¾ Ð¸Ð¼ÐµÐ½Ð¸, Ð˜ÑÐºÐ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð±Ñ€ÐµÐ½Ð´Ð¸Ñ€Ð¾Ð²Ð°Ð½Ð½Ñ‹Ðµ Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´ÑƒÐºÑ‚Ñ‹, Ð˜ÑÐºÐ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð¸Ð½Ð³Ñ€ÐµÐ´Ð¸ÐµÐ½Ñ‚Ñ‹ Ð¿Ñ€Ð¾Ð´ÑƒÐºÑ‚Ð¾Ð²

parameters.name: code
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('code', '#### UPC/EAN barcode **Example** > ```&code=0842234000988```', 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get a branded food item using a barcode

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  â€¢ code (required) - #### UPC/EAN barcode **Example** > ```&code=0842234000988```

parameters.name: name
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('name', '#### Search for branded food items using a general food name keyword. This does not have to exactly match the "official" name for the food. **Example** > ```&name=Starburst```', 'string') }}

parameters.name: limit
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('limit', '#### Set maximum number of records you want the API to return. The default value is "**10**." **Example** > ```&limit=10```', 'number') }}

parameters.name: page
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('page', '#### This is how you paginate the search result. By default, you will see the first 10 records. You must increment the page number to access the next 10 records, and so on. The default value is "**1**." **Example** > ```&page=1```', 'number') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get a branded food item by name

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  â€¢ name (required) - #### Search for branded food items using a general food name keyword. This does not have to exactly match the "official" name for the food. **Example** > ```&name=Starburst```
  â€¢ limit (optional) - #### Set maximum number of records you want the API to return. The default value is "**10**." **Example** > ```&limit=10```
  â€¢ page (optional) - #### This is how you paginate the search result. By default, you will see the first 10 records. You must increment the page number to access the next 10 records, and so on. The default value is "**1**." **Example** > ```&page=1```

parameters.name: allergen
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('allergen', '#### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific allergen. **Example** > ```&allergen=Peanuts``` **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.', 'string') }}

parameters.name: category

It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.', 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get data for branded food items using various search parameters

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  â€¢ allergen (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific allergen. **Example** > ```&allergen=Peanuts``` **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.
  â€¢ brand (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that are owned by a specific brand. **Example** > ```&brand=Starbucks```
  â€¢ category (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods from a specific category. **Example** > ```&category=Plant Based Foods```
  â€¢ country (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that are sold in a specific country. **Example** > ```&country=United States``` **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.
  â€¢ diet (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that are considered compatible with a specific diet. **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.
  â€¢ ingredient (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific ingredient. **Example** > ```&ingredient=Salt```
  â€¢ keyword (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that are associated with a specific keyword. **Example** > ```&keyword=Organic``` **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.
  â€¢ mineral (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific mineral. **Example** > ```&mineral=Potassium```
  â€¢ nutrient (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific nutrient. **Example** > ```&nutrient=Caffeine``` **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.
  â€¢ palm_oil (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific ingredient made using palm oil. **Example** > ```&palm_oil=E160a Beta Carotene```
  â€¢ trace (optional) - ### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific trace ingredient. **Example** > ```&trace=Tree Nuts``` **Important Note**: This parameter cannot be used alone. It must be paired with at least 1 additional parameter.
  â€¢ vitamin (optional) - #### Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific vitamin. **Example** > ```&vitamin=Biotin```
  â€¢ limit (optional) - #### Set maximum number of records you want the API to return. The default value is "**10**." **Example** > ```&limit=10```
  â€¢ page (optional) - #### This is how you paginate the search result. By default, you will see the first 10 records. You must increment the page number to access the next 10 records, and so on. The default value is "**1**." **Example** > ```&page=1```

parameters.name: find
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('find', 'Search our database for a single ingredient or a specific set of ingredients. **Example #1: Single Ingredient** > ```&find=raw broccoli``` **Example #2: Set of Ingredients** > ```&find=raw broccoli,buttermilk waffle,mashed potatoes``` **Important Notes** * Comma-separated lists cannot contain more than **10 ingredients**. You must perform additional API calls if you are looking up more than 10 ingredients.', 'string') }}

parameters.name: limit
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('limit', '#### Set maximum number of records you want the API to return, per search term. The default value is "**1**." **Example** > ```&limit=3```', 'number') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get raw/generic food ingredient item(s)

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  â€¢ find (required) - Search our database for a single ingredient or a specific set of ingredients. **Example #1: Single Ingredient** > ```&find=raw broccoli``` **Example #2: Set of Ingredients** > ```&find=raw broccoli,buttermilk waffle,mashed potatoes``` **Important Notes** * Comma-separated lists cannot contain more than **10 ingredients**. You must perform additional API calls if you are looking up more than 10 ingredients.
  â€¢ limit (optional) - #### Set maximum number of records you want the API to return, per search term. The default value is "**1**." **Example** > ```&limit=3```
